examples.example: 生活就像芝麻开花节节高，充满了美好的希望与惊喜。

translate.english: Life is like sesame blooming steadily, full of beautiful hopes and surprises.

examples.example: 妈妈今天做的芝麻饼香气扑鼻，十分诱人。

translate.english: The sesame cake made by mother today is fragrant and very attractive.

examples.example: 我在面包上撒了些芝麻，让面包更加美味可口。

translate.english: I sprinkled some sesame seeds on the bread to make it more delicious and tasty.
